attributes.title: Very Fishy
attributes.review: This app is horrible and needs major updates!!!! I need to be able to get all my trump info but it’s to hard to navigate the letters are too small. Very very upset. Lost vote 😝

attributes.title: TRASH APP
attributes.review:
I literally downloaded this app so i could keep up with the pedo president cheeto n suddenly i got hexed my blue lives matter flag burned up in flames my dog turned into a cheeto n my brother started wearing polos and khakis and suddenly i got a fake spray tan n i was yellow

THIS APP IS GARBAGE 🤢🤮

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app is so hard to use  it’s hard to read the words and see the pictures clearly my pet Dino tried to use it to she could not figure it out WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app was horrible. It was going super slow. It was spreading false information and kept asking me if I wanted notifications. I don’t recommend this app it’s FAKE NEWS!

attributes.title: Sent My Mom to the Hospital
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. I was using it (even though it’s really bad) and my mom looked over my shoulder to see what I was on my phone for and started seizing. I hate it. Screw you Trump app.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: guys, seriously do NOT get this app!! 😡 once i downloaded it a big cheeto man appeared under my bed at night! 😦😲🤮super scary! 👺 def the bogeyman 😱😱 instead you should stream left and right by seventeen to keep the cheeto away 🕺😴 stan 💋 gen z 👁📱🧚‍♀️😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app was horrible. My fish has cancer and the app gave my laptop a virus so couldn’t call the doctor. But then my cat ate the fish out of the tank and gave the cat cancer. So my TV caught a virus from the app. Now my cat is gonna to die. The end

attributes.title: BUNKER BOY
attributes.review: Terrible app you would think since he can’t walk, speak or even run a country correctly maybe he could design a decent app but I have to say I’m not impressed anyways🧚🏽✨how y’all doin?

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: Once again, the orange man hath failed us. This app is terrible. It gave me the coronavirus, because much like the president, I was warned of it’s dangers, but decided to do nothing because I’m a selfish garbage person. It’s sad, very sad.

attributes.title: trump2020...✨on a gravestone✨
attributes.review: This app is terrible, it killed my grandma and my dog, it stole my gold fish and burned my house down, then when I tried to delete it, the app just called me fat and stabbed my Mom, it conned me out of $20 too
